sources.title: 1938 Salonwagen E 417 ( Käthe Von Nagy, Ilse Fürstenberg, Paul Hörbiger, Hilde Körber, Aribert Wäscher)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1938. Salonwagen E 417. u.a mit Paul Hörbiger und Hilde Körber

metadata.Plot: At midnight in the museum of transportation, the spirits of different conveyances throughout time gather to welcome a new member. The spirit of salon car E 417 tells tales of his long history involving romances and intrigues. He knows the secrets of princes and vagabonds, of baronesses and street girls. In particular, he knows the story of that very museum's tour guide and the secret the man carries with him.
metadata.Actors: Paul Hörbiger, Käthe von Nagy, Curd Jürgens
